column2: Apache natural gas well has leak beneath floor of U.S. Gulf NEW YORK
column3: Feb 16 Natural gas from a well being drilled by Apache Corporation in the U.S. Gulf of Mexico  has flowed underground
column4: leading U.S. regulators to order the company to prepare to drill a relief well to control the flow if necessary
column5: the U.S. Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement said.
